statements: DELETE FROM pilot_certifications WHERE certification_name = 'Commercial Pilot' AND expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM pilot_certifications WHERE pilot_id = 123 AND certification_name = 'Level 1';
DELETE FROM pilot_certifications WHERE certification_name = 'Level 2' AND expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TrainingRecords WHERE training_type = 'Emergency Landing';
DELETE FROM TrainingRecords WHERE training_type = 'Emergency Landing' AND training_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PilotCertifications WHERE certification_type = 'Instrument Rating' AND certification_date < '2021-06-15';
DELETE FROM Pilots WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Pilots WHERE pilot_id = 101 AND full_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM TrainingRecords WHERE pilot_id = (SELECT pilot_id FROM Pilots WHERE certification_type = 'Commercial') AND training_type = 'Flight Simulator' AND training_duration > 60;
